ygData.subject: Re: Twinking & Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Go kill something about 7 lvls higher than you by kiting and thenm tell me exp is still great it will totally suck your not ment  to be fighting stuff solo at
ygData.messageBody:
Go kill something about 7 lvls higher than you by kiting and thenm
tell me exp is still great it will totally suck your not ment to be
fighting stuff solo at that high of a lvl. Now being groupeed has totaly
diff.cap on exp all together but soloing no it just gives no exp at all.
-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:10 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting


From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

Heh, I dont know where you got this news but its not true. There is a
cap on total xp given but you still get crazy xp from killing stuff that
much higher than you. Seen it and done it.

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, The Scotts wrote:

> From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
>
> Well you heard wrong because it is known that when you fight
> something that is 5+ lvls higher than you exp sucks this is to keep such a
> thing from happening the DEV team did this because stuff at that lvl are
not
> meant for players at that low of a lvl to fight believe me and a friend
> where with a group (not grouped but they hgealed us buffed...etc) fighting
> SandGiants and the exp was awful I got better exp fighting hihgh greens.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1) <robert_kauffman@...>
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 12:59 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
>
>
> >From: "KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1)"
<robert_kauffman@...>
> >
> >That is not necessarily true. I'm a level 4 cleric with full banded and
2
> >combine weapons plus jewelry. When I started this character I played
till
> I
> >had gotten about 4 plat then I started brewing. Once I became a master
> >brewer I started pottery. With pottery you can make 30-40 plat an hour.
I
> >have not been twinked but I would fit your description. Another twinking
> >method is for a high level cleric to buff a low level character and then
> >stun a mid level creature as the low level character kills him. I have
> >heard of a guild that can have a new character to level 20 in 5 hours
with
> >this method.
> >
> >Fidan
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: LordRhaa@... [mailto:LordRhaa@...]
> >Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 10:50 AM
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
> >
> >
> >From: LordRhaa@...
> >
> > I have heard several descriptions for it but the most common is when
> >
> >you give your low lvl Char equip or money from your higher lvl char.
Like
> a
> >
> >lvl 2 Cleric with full chainmail you know has been twinked.
> >
> > Kiting is when that Druid (or other caster with a DOT spell) casts
> >it
> >on a monster and then runs, casts, runs,ect .. till the monster is dead.
> >
